Look is nice but it is 100% polyester, which was what I was avoiding. It stated clearly "Material: 35% Cotton + 65% Polyester."  I fit a size 36 so bought the one that said 36-38.  It was too small. I could button it up but definitely would not sit with it on.  Planning on returning it but also found out that I need to pay for the shipping back to return it.  Very disappointed.

While it sits well with my body type, the type of material is false advertising, as it seems to be pure polyester, not 100% Cotton like the advert describes, and it is even labelled as such on the trousers I bought.  I will be keeping them, but buyer beware.
